context: Analyze this inversion pose and identify comprehensive transition relationships. Headstand (Sirsasana) Inverted balance on crown of head. Consider the Upper body strength, core stability, circulation. Analyze transitions that flow naturally from this pose and evaluate both immediate possibilities and progressive developments. Factor in modifications for different ability levels and the pose's role in creating balanced sequences.

practitioner.position: Inverted balance on crown of head
practitioner.primaryFocus: Upper body strength, core stability, circulation

specificNeeds: Upper body strength, core stability, circulation
